title: Personal Money
short_description: Mobile app for personal expense tracker

details.title: Personal Money
details.description: Mobile app for personal expense tracker. You can register all your incomes and expense and the app organize for you by date, and show you how much do you expend or gain, help with savings methods and much more..

title: GoodMarket List

details.title: GoodMarket List
details.description: Mobile app for supermarket shopping and compare prices, share lists, find lowest prices and much more..

title: Social Restaurant
short_description: Mobile app for find the best places around you.

details.title: Social Restaurant
details.description: Mobile app for find the best places around you. You can find places, make friend and share your experience, all this in your hand.

title: InQ
short_description: Web applications for appointment management and reservation.

details.title: InQ
details.description: Web applications for appointment management and reservation. You can reserve an appointment with the professionals on this platform or you can have some customers and expand your business.
